function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of shared wearable devices and smart technology in educational settings.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among students and teachers.","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization of wearable devices and smart technology, implementation of strict hygiene protocols, and reduced sharing of devices.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings for devices, touchless technology, and device tracking for sanitization cycles.","People":"Students, teachers, administrative staff.","Owner":"Educational institutions, device manufacturers, and technology providers."}]}
